abilities.name: Buffer
abilities.effect: If Hoppip would be Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, Hoppip is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.name: Miracle Powder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.
